bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Metal-Enclosed Low-Voltage Power Circuit Breaker Switchgear---Amendment 1: Short-Time and Short-Circuit Withstand Current Tests---Minimum Areas for Multiple Cable Connections
IEEE Standard for Metal-Enclosed Low-Voltage Power Circuit Breaker Switchgear---Amendment 1: Short-Time and Short-Circuit Withstand Current Tests---Minimum Areas for Multiple Cable Connections
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.20.1a-2005 (Amendment to IEEE Std C37.20.1-2002)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment revises IEEE Std C37.20.1-2002. Use of “dummy elements,” previously allowed for short-circuit tests in 6.2.4 and 6.2.5.2, is eliminated. Errors made in converting areas in Table 10 to metric units are corrected.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C37.20.1-2002 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.20.1-1993)
